languages.text: "Удивлен, что вам это удалось. Но, вероятно, это к лучшему — я предполагал, что вы вступите в конфронтацию, но ожидал более трагичного ее исхода. Ценю ваш миротворческий пыл".
"I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."
languages.original_text: "Удивлен, что вам это удалось. Но, вероятно, это к лучшему — я предполагал, что вы вступите в конфронтацию, но ожидал более трагичного ее исхода. Ценю ваш миротворческий пыл".

traits.locale_text: "I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."
"I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."
"I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."
"I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."

languages.text: “你居然能完成这样的壮举，我真的非常惊讶。不过，这或许才是最好的结果。我早就预料到你们两个会发生冲突，但我原以为冲突的结果会更加惨烈。我很钦佩你对和平的热忱。”
languages.original_text: "I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."

traits.locale_text: “你居然能完成这样的壮举，我真的非常惊讶。不过，这或许才是最好的结果。我早就预料到你们两个会发生冲突，但我原以为冲突的结果会更加惨烈。我很钦佩你对和平的热忱。”

languages.text: «Me sorprende que lo haya conseguido, pero probablemente sea lo mejor. Había supuesto que se enfrentarían y pensaba que el resultado sería más trágico. Debo admirar su fervor por la paz».
languages.original_text: "I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."

traits.locale_text: «Me sorprende que lo haya conseguido, pero probablemente sea lo mejor. Había supuesto que se enfrentarían y pensaba que el resultado sería más trágico. Debo admirar su fervor por la paz».

languages.text: 「お前にそのような手腕があったとは驚いた。だが、おそらくそれが最適だ…私はお前たちふたりは対立しているものだと思っていたから、もっと悲劇的な結果を想定していたよ。平和維持に熱意を燃やしている点は称賛しよう」
languages.original_text: "I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."

traits.locale_text: 「お前にそのような手腕があったとは驚いた。だが、おそらくそれが最適だ…私はお前たちふたりは対立しているものだと思っていたから、もっと悲劇的な結果を想定していたよ。平和維持に熱意を燃やしている点は称賛しよう」

languages.text: « Je suis surpris que vous ayez réussi pareil exploit. Enfin, c'est sans doute pour le mieux. Je savais qu'il y aurait de l'orage entre vous deux, mais je m'attendais à une issue plus sanglante. J'admire vos méthodes pacifiques. »
languages.original_text: "I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis surpris que vous ayez réussi pareil exploit. Enfin, c'est sans doute pour le mieux. Je savais qu'il y aurait de l'orage entre vous deux, mais je m'attendais à une issue plus sanglante. J'admire vos méthodes pacifiques. »

languages.text: "Ich bin überrascht, dass Euch das gelungen ist. Wahrscheinlich ist so am besten – ich dachte mir, dass Ihr beide aneinandergeraten würdet, hatte aber ein tragischeres Ende erwartet. Ich bewundere Euren Eifer dabei, Frieden zu wahren."
languages.original_text: "I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin überrascht, dass Euch das gelungen ist. Wahrscheinlich ist so am besten – ich dachte mir, dass Ihr beide aneinandergeraten würdet, hatte aber ein tragischeres Ende erwartet. Ich bewundere Euren Eifer dabei, Frieden zu wahren."

languages.text: "Böyle bir işi başarmana şaşırdım. Gerçi böyle daha iyi oldu. İkinizin çatışacağını düşünmüştüm, neticenin daha acıklı olmasını bekliyordum. Barışı sürdürme gayretine hayran kaldım."
languages.original_text: "I am surprised you managed such a feat. However, it is probably for the best — I assumed the two of you would clash, but I expected a more tragic outcome. I admire your zeal for peacekeeping."
